missionIntro.content: Sensei, these students wish to master the age-old tradition of samurai style cooking.
Must move like ninja! Can't be slow!
No problem! Hey, chef-in-training! You've helped prepare a meal before, right?
Yeah? Well I made buttered toast once...
There are five belts to earn. Obtain the top belt to earn the honor of being called Super Sushi Chef!
Now that's a title I'd want! Let's get started!

missionOutro.content: Hey, that was fun! Making sushi is great!
Impressive! You conquered every challenge, which means you earned every belt: yellow, orange, green, purple, and black! You have also earned a new title...
Super Sushi Chef!
woo hoo
Awesome!
Our restaurant's fame has grown now that another notable sushi maker is here. Thanks!
Thank you and congratulations!
Bye for now! Let's see what path we take on next!

0.content: To earn this YELLOW BELT you'll need to prove that you're a fast learner at learning the sushi basics.
For this challenge Sensei wants five correct responses!

1.content: To be a good chef, one must know good taste! For this ORANGE BELT you must not only taste delicious food but eat it correctly!
For this challenge Sensei wants seven correct responses!

0.content: Fantastic! You have earned a yellow belt for learning the basics. Don't worry, there is plenty more to learn!
You're off to a good start, sushi buddy! What's your favorite thing about making sushi so far?

1.content: Sensational! You have earned an orange belt for learning the importance of taste in cooking!
Sweet! Say, if you could taste any food at this very moment, what would it be?

missionIntro.content: Sensei, these two desire to become your official sumo pros by getting big and learning proper eating etiquette.
We're ready to grow big and strong! Hey, sumo-in-training! Have you ever seen a real sumo match before?
Don't worry, we don't have to wear those big diaper looking things.
There are five belts to earn. Obtain the best belt and you'll reach the highest rank in sumo -- Yokozuna!
I like how that sounds! Let's get started!

missionOutro.content: What a great time! Becoming a sumo is cooler than I thought!
Wow, you conquered every challenge, which means you earned every belt: yellow, orange, green, purple, and black! You have also earned a new title...
Yokozuna!
woo hoo
We rock!
Word has spread that a skilled and powerful sumo grew strong here! Thank you for attracting the best sumo in the world to our restaurant!
We are proud of you!
Thanks! It was fun! Well, let's see what path we take on next!

0.content: Your road starts by learning the sumo diet with proper eating etiquette! Prove yourself to earn this YELLOW BELT!
For this challenge Sensei  wants five correct responses!

1.content: Although eating is good, a sumo has a strict diet! No junk food! Earning this ORANGE BELT will require some fast thinking!
For this challenge Sensei wants seven correct responses!

0.content: Wonderful! You have earned a yellow belt for learning the basics. You're closer to becoming a giant sumo!
Nice! Hey future sumo, what's your favorite sport to watch or play?

1.content: Unreal! You have earned an orange belt for avoiding junk food well!
Cool! Hey, future sumo! What's your favorite junk food?

missionIntro.content: Sensei, these disciples wish to prove their physical ability and mental wit by becoming sushi gurus.
Gurus are wise! You up to task?
Oh yeah! Mom always says you are what you eat! Hey, guru-in-training! What's your favorite healthy snack?
I like veggies! Well, only with lots of ranch...
There are five belts to earn. Obtain the highest one to be known as Guru Master!

missionOutro.content: How fun! I loved learning how important food is to growing strong and healthy!
Phenomenal! You conquered every challenge, which means you earned every belt: yellow, orange, green, purple, and black! You have also earned the title...
Guru Master!
woo hoo
Oh yeah!
People the world over are now arriving here to seek both nutritious food and advice on healthy eating!
I thank you greatly, Ben and friend!
We couldn't have done it without your great training! Well, let's see what path we take on next!

0.content: A samurai's path to healthy diet is vitamin-rich juices! Become lean, mean juicing machines to earn this YELLOW BELT!
For this challenge Sensei wants five correct responses!

1.content: A guru also good at using his energy to gain strength! You'll earn this ORANGE BELT by showing me your karate skills!
For this challenge Sensei wants seven correct responses!

0.content: Marvelous! You have earned a yellow belt for learning the basics of our nutritious juices!
Woohoo! Does your mom or dad ever make you healthy smoothies or juices?
My dad likes radish juice... yuck!

1.content: Spectacular! You have earned a orange belt. Diet and exercise is the key to healthy life!
Awesome! Hey sushi buddy, have you ever watched a karate movie before?
I think they're fun to watch!
